bib.title: Evaluation of corporate structure based on social network analysis
bib.author: Palus, Sebastian and Kazienko, Przemyslaw and Michalski, Radoslaw
bib.abstract: Social network analysis provides helpful reports and comparisons, which may support the corporate human resources management. Several ideas, measurements, interpretations and evaluation methods are presented and discussed in the chapter, in particular group detection, centrality degree, location analysis, process management support, dynamic analysis, and social concept networks.
bib.booktitle: Social Development and High Technology Industries: Strategies and Applications
